title: Madhya Bharat. Part 1
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and K Khandpur
brief_description: A pictorial survey of northern Madhya Bharat. Gwalior in all its stately grandeur; its architecture and crafts; Gwalior as a modern metropolis. The towns of Chanderi and Bhelsa, further south.
creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and K Khandpur
